channel.title: Missing Data on Matt Barstead's Research, Blog, & Repository
channel.description: Recent content in Missing Data on Matt Barstead's Research, Blog, & Repository

item.title: Bayesian Multilevel Model with Missing Data: Complete Work Flow - Part 1 of 3
item.description: Overview: This is the first post in a three-part blog series I am putting together. The focus of this initial post is effective exploration of the reasons for missingness in a particular set of data. The second post in the series will focus on running and evaluating the imputation model itself after having identified the appropriate covariates that help account for missingness. The third and final post will be a walkthrough of the final models and their interpretation - including a comparison of the same models using listwise deletion (which is bad unless missingness is small or definitely, 100% completely at random).
